name: Earthward
description:
Earthward is a action shooter game in which you must defend your planet from waves of alien attacks.

Earthward are made in 72hours for Ludum Dare #34 with the theme "2 buttons controls" by:


Luke - @_mappache
Prog

Rey - @reylisten
Art



--- Controls ---

Left Click - Shoot and Select Menu

Right Click - fuel costs and dash for one direction


Vote!

Rate this game in Ludum Dare, we really appreciate this :3

Comments are welcome too!

~
